Utils Preferences Module

Module to load preferences.

class proteus.controllers.utils.preferences.Preferences

Class to load settings from registry.

static load_all(main: QMainWindow) → QSettings
Parameters:

main – Main Window.

Returns:

QSettings class.

static load_language(main: QMainWindow, language: str) → None

Method that load the language.

Parameters:

  • main – Main window.

  • language – Language.

static load_theme(main: QMainWindow, theme: str) → None

Method that load the theme.

Parameters:

  • main – Main window.

  • theme – Theme.

class proteus.controllers.utils.preferences.PreferencesDialog(parent)

Dialog to change preferences.

load_preferences() → None

Method that load preferences from the settings.

select_archetypes_path()

Method that select the path of the archetypes directory, save it in settings with the name archetype_custom_folder, as well as in the input path field.

select_xslt_path()

Method that select the path of the XSLT directory, save it in the settings with the name xslt_custom_folder, as well as in the input path field.

update_preferences() → None

Method that update the preferences.
